data.eml:eml: The crab spiders of the genus Lysiteles from Yunnan Province, China (Araneae: Thomisidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tang, Guo, Yin, Chang-Ming, Peng, Xian-Jin, Ubick, Darrell, Griswold, Charles (2008): The crab spiders of the genus Lysiteles from Yunnan Province, China (Araneae: Thomisidae). Zootaxa 1742: 1-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181540
